document.masterDocTitle: Diversity of Coralliophilinae (Mollusca, Neogastropoda, Muricidae) at Austral Islands (South Pacific)

subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE SPECIES. —
Fusus neritoideus Lamarck, 1816
(=
Purpura violacea Kiener, 1836
), by subsequent designation ( Iredale 1912 ).

The genus
Coralliophila
is here used in a wide sense (
Coralliophila
s.l. ), including species traditionally ascribed to it ( Kosuge & Suzuki 1985 ; Tsuchiya 2000 ). However, I warn here that there is strong molecular evidence that
Coralliophila
as traditionally conceived is clearly polyphyletic ( Oliverio & Mariottini 2001 ;
Oliverio et al. 2002
;
Oliverio et al. 2009
). Th erefore, the concept of the genus and also the list of synonymies for
Coralliophila
are destined to be deeply revised in a phylogenetic framework.
